snippet: Should Serena Williams and Stan Wawrinka retain their French Open titles in June, they will take home 200,000 euros  ($225,540) more than last year, after the tournament announced an increase in prize money on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Should Serena Williams and Stan Wawrinka retain their French Open titles in June, they will take home 200,000 euros  ($225,540) more than last year, after the tournament announced an increase in prize money on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: French Open Hikes Prize Money by 14 Percent
headline.main: French Open Hikes Prize Money by 14 Percent
